answers.answer: Hi,Would you be able to elaborate on your brother's condition. Here are some questions to guide you:When did his condition start?For how long has he experienced this?Was he completely assessed by his physicians? What tests were done?Also, would you be able to point out any significant factors or associated events that surrounded the onset of your brother's bedwetting?Does your brother have any problems in terms of his physical and mental developmental processes?Any previously diagnosed kidney or bladder infections?Any history of prior surgery or trauma to the abdomen or groin area?Other associated disease like a nerve problem or diabetes ?Bear with my questions as I feel that these are relevant and may help give me a clearer picture of your brother's case.I will be waiting for your answers.

question: Actuallty  my brother is 22 years old and suffering from bedwetting from the childhood . We have consulted many doctors but in vain . we get the same response that he will be all right according to the time.so this is my kind request .please suggest me some medicine for him . i shall be very thankful to you?
title: bedwetting
